ideas.title: Workspace Studio aims to solve the real agent problem: Getting employees to use them
ideas.description: One problem enterprises face is getting employees to actually use the AI agents their dev teams have built. Google, which has already shipped many AI tools through its Workspace apps, has made Google Workspace Studio generally available to give more employees access to design, manage and share AI agents, further democratizing agentic workflows. This puts Google directly in competition with Microsoft’s Copilot and undercuts some integrations that brought OpenAI’s ChatGPT into enterprise applicati
hooks: AI Agents: Why Employees Aren't Using Them
Google's Secret Weapon for AI Adoption

tips: Use interactive poll about AI tool adoption
Include data visualization of AI adoption rates
Optimize for SEO with technical keywords
Add expert quote or external validation

visualDirection.description: Bold, tech-forward design with dynamic gradient overlays, futuristic sans-serif typography, abstract AI-inspired geometric shapes, dark mode color palette with electric blue and deep purple accents, subtle motion graphics suggesting workflow transformation

exampleOutline: Section 2: Why Current Enterprise AI Falls Short
Section 3: Google Workspace Studio - A Game Changer
Section 5: Future of Enterprise AI Collaboration

ideas.title: 8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz
ideas.description: To create self-serve templates that bend—but don’t break—brand designers need to consider work through a marketing lens. Here’s how to set up editing guardrails and design layouts that flex and scale.
hooks: Unlock Figma's secret brand scaling playbook
Make templates that work harder than you

tips: Include live Figma template demo screenshot

ideas.title: AWS launches Kiro powers with Stripe, Figma, and Datadog integrations for AI-assisted coding
ideas.description: Amazon Web Services on Wednesday introduced Kiro powers, a system that allows software developers to give their AI coding assistants instant, specialized expertise in specific tools and workflows — addressing what the company calls a fundamental bottleneck in how artificial intelligence agents operate today.AWS made the announcement at its annual re:Invent conference in Las Vegas. The capability marks a departure from how most AI coding tools work today. Typically, these tools load every possibl
hooks: AI Coding Revolution: AWS Rewrites Developer Playbook
Instant Expertise: How AWS Transforms Coding Workflows
Beyond ChatGPT: AWS Unlocks Contextual AI Development

tips: Include live code snippet demonstrating integration
Share personal experience testing Kiro powers
Add real-time screen recording of workflow

ideas.title: Delivering securely on data and AI strategy
ideas.description: Most organizations feel the imperative to keep pace with continuing advances in AI capabilities, as highlighted in a recent MIT Technology Review Insights report. That clearly has security implications, particularly as organizations navigate a surge in the volume, velocity, and variety of security data. This explosion of data, coupled with fragmented toolchains, is making it…
hooks: AI Security: Your Data's Silent Guardian
Cracking the Code of Enterprise AI Safety
Navigate AI Risk Before It Navigates You

tips: Share personal AI risk assessment template
Use interactive inline polls about reader's AI security concerns
Deep dive into technical security frameworks
Embed expert quote graphics for visual interest
